mapper.insert: select ticket_goods_id_seq.nextval from dual insert into TICKET_GOODS(goods_id, goods_sort, goods_title, goods_publisher, goods_place, goods_price, goods_sales_price, goods_point, goods_expired_date, goods_status, goods_terms, goods_usage, goods_description, goods_lastsale_date) values(#{goods_id}, #{goods_sort}, #{goods_title}, #{goods_publisher}, #{goods_place}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_sales_price}, #{goods_point}, #{goods_expired_date}, #{goods_status }, #{goods_terms}, #{goods_usage}, #{goods_description:VARCHAR}, #{goods_lastsale_date})

select TICKET_IMAGE_ID_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into TICKET_IMAGE (image_id, goods_id, fileName, fileType, reg_id) values(#{image_id}, #{goods_id}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: select * from ( select rowNum as recNum, goods_id, goods_sort, goods_place, goods_title, goods_publisher, goods_price, goods_sales_price, goods_point, goods_status, goods_lastsale_date, to_char(GOODS_EXPIRED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as GOODS_EXPIRED_DATE from ( select goods_id, goods_sort, goods_place, goods_title, goods_publisher, goods_price, goods_sales_price, goods_point, GOODS_EXPIRED_DATE, goods_status, goods_lastsale_date from TICKET_GOODS ) order by goods_id desc ) where recNum between (#{section}-1)*100+ (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum})*10

select g.*,to_char(g.goods_expired_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as goods_expired_date, d.fileName from TICKET_GOODS g, TICKET_IMAGE d where g.goods_id=d.goods_id and d.filetype='main_image' and g.goods_id=#{goods_id} order by g.goods_id
select * from TICKET_IMAGE where goods_id=#{goods_id} order by image_id asc
mapper.update: update TICKET_IMAGE set fileName=#{fileName} where goods_id=#{goods_id} and image_id=#{image_id}
